TopicTitle: Reload a model without reloading all of KSP

Articles.Content: Is it possible to make the game reload a model without having to restart the game?
Alt-F12 when at the KSC screen, click on database, and hit reload all

That reloads cfgs. I doubt it reloads models.

You could write a plugin to do it though.
I've noticed it pick up model changes before, as you can see it loading each part into the Space Center scene. I don't know if there are any caveats to it though.
Reloading the game database reloads the CFG and will reload the model.
Thanks. Is it possible to reload just the part/model I want to?

Thanks. Is it possible to reload just the part/model I want to?

Nope I'm afraid not.
When you click reload it detects if you made a cfg change or model change and reloads accordingly. For just cfg changes it goes much faster I have noticed.
Huh. Well, the more you know. Cheers.
I noticed it doesn't reload things it doesn't have to. Nice job on that Squad. It really helps for debugging the airlock on a part.
